mapper.select: select a.roomcode,a.name roomname,b.name typename,a.howmany,a.howmuch from room a, roomtype b where a.type =b.typecode order by roomname
select typecode, name from roomtype order by typecode
select a.bookcode,b.name roomname,a.roomcode,a.person,a.checkin,a.checkout,a.name,a.mobile from booking a, room b where a.roomcode =b.roomcode order by bookcode

select a.bookcode,b.name roomname,a.roomcode,a.person,a.checkin,a.checkout,a.name,a.mobile from booking a, room b where a.checkout > #{param1} and a.checkin < #{param2} and a.roomcode = b.roomcode order by bookcode
